statements: UPDATE debt_management_team SET recovery_rate=0.75, age_of_debt=30 WHERE debtor_name='John Doe';
UPDATE debt_management_team SET debt_amount=1000.00, collection_efficiency=0.90 WHERE id=5;
UPDATE debt_management_team SET collection_efficiency = 0.85, recovery_rate = 0.60 WHERE debtor_name = 'John Doe' AND debt_amount > 5000.00;
UPDATE debt_management_team SET age_of_debt = age_of_debt + 1, collection_efficiency = 0.90 WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE debt_management_teams SET recovery_rate = 0.75, collection_efficiency = 0.65 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE debt_records SET debt_amount = 1500.50, debt_status = 'overdue' WHERE record_id = 100;
UPDATE debt_records SET debt_status='overdue', debt_amount=2500.00 WHERE record_id=1001;
UPDATE debt_management_teams SET recovery_rate=0.75, collection_efficiency=0.85 WHERE id=10;
UPDATE debtors SET debt_amount = 1500.50, payment_status = TRUE WHERE debtor_id = 1;
UPDATE debts SET debt_amount = 3000.25, debt_age_days = 45 WHERE debt_id = 3;
UPDATE debtors SET debtor_name = 'John Doe', debt_amount = 5000.00, payment_status = TRUE WHERE debtor_id = 1001;
UPDATE collections SET collection_amount = 2000.00, collection_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE collection_id = 3005;
UPDATE debt_management_teams SET team_lead = 'John Doe' WHERE team_id = 1;
UPDATE aging_of_debts SET debt_age = 30, debt_amount = 5000.00 WHERE debt_id = 101;
UPDATE debt_management_teams SET team_name = 'New Team Name' WHERE team_id = 1;
UPDATE recovery_rates SET recovery_rate = 75.50, team_id = 2 WHERE rate_id = 3;
UPDATE debtors SET address = '123 Main St', phone_number = '555-1234' WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE debts SET amount = 2000.50, status = 'Paid' WHERE debt_id = 1;
UPDATE debtors SET address = '123 Main St', phone_number = '+123456789' WHERE debtor_id = 1;
UPDATE debts SET status = 'Paid', amount = 2000.00 WHERE debt_id = 3;
